title: AMDomination - NEW Ryzen 3000XT CPUs and B550 Motherboards Explained!
description: AMD surprised us today with the launch of the new Ryzen 9 3900XT, Ryzen 7 3800XT and Ryzen 5 3600XT.  These processors have better performance and benchmarks than the 3900X, 3800X and 3600X and do it with the same TDPs.  The new B550 motherboards are also available today so let's check out those too, with even some mATX and ITX B550 boards.    Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Prime B550-Plus -  Prime B550M-A Wifi -  Prime B550-A -   TUF B550 Plus -  TUF B550m Wifi -    TUF B550m -     STRIX B550-I -    STRIX B550-E -  STRIX B550-F Wifi -  STRIX B550-F -     Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by ASUS. This video is not sponsored. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer. As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera (Dmitry) -  Main Lens (Dmitry) -  Main Camera (Eber) -  Main Lens (Eber) -  Main 2nd Lens (Eber) -  Main Camera Mic (D & E) -  Cheap 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Awesome Slider -  Our Shotgun Mic -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #ryzen3900xt #b550motherboard #hardwarecanucks
